title: Not being able to connect into game atm
body: Just a blank black screen at champion load out none of the splashes show. then it loads out saying the usual "unable to connect, firewall blah blah" server status hasn't changed just need an opinion. This was a Normal game, still wont let me reconnect numerous times.

replies.body:
You won't get a ban for this. You might get a penalty, however. Until you've fixed this problem, do not play match-made games. Go into custom games to test. You can't get penalties for custom games.

What OS are you on, and who's your ISP? What have you tried so far to fix this?

Haven't been able to connect to 3 games just this morning with same error each time. Was playing flawlessly last night, these are just norm games. Can I please get some assistance since there is no send in a ticket for these kind of problems anymore?! I'm probably going to get a ban given the two dc's last month from same ongoing issues. Was waiting an hour between each game, already tried loading as admin closing security programs ect.
okay this has happened numerous times since last night and I'm about to get a ban over it so I'm not impressed
